name: recycle (itch) (verysoapybubbles)
description:
This is a short visual novel-style game I made so I could get a hold of the basic knowledge of how to use Ren'Py. In the future, I will be releasing more complex and professional games :)

Recycle has three endings which are all pretty easy to get in a short period of time (under 20 minutes from my experience) 

this game contains mention of a cult (not explicitly said in-game that it's a cult but still) so if you're uncomfortable with that maybe don't download this!

I did all the art and character design and all that
